name: Acher Aviation
about: Archer Aviation, in partnership with Etihad Training, is pioneering the training of pilots for electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft. Based in Abu Dhabi, our flying school is dedicated to recruiting and training the first class of qualified pilots to operate Archer’s Midnight aircraft. The Midnight is a piloted, four-passenger eVTOL designed for rapid back-to-back flights, transforming urban travel with safe, sustainable, and cost-competitive air taxi services. Our training program includes the use of a Midnight aircraft simulator at Etihad Training’s facilities, ensuring compliance with regulatory certifications and local aviation authorities. With a focus on establishing a thriving urban air mobility network, we are committed to providing comprehensive and innovative pilot training.
